results.title: Is metformin effective for reducing weight in obese or overweight adolescents?
results.text_hl: OVER A PERIOD OF 6 MONTHS, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@METFORMIN@@@ MODESTLY REDUCED WEIGHT (-2.1 KG) AND @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@BODY FAT MASS@@@ (-1.9%), BUT NOT @DISEASE_607447 @DISEASE_OMIM:607447 @@@BODY MASS INDEX@@@ (@DISEASE_607447 @DISEASE_OMIM:607447 @@@BMI@@@) OR @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@LEAN BODY MASS@@@, IN ADOLESCENTS WHO WERE @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@OVERWEIGHT@@@ OR @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@OBESE@@@.

citations.NLM: Anderson K, Kelsberg G, Safranek S. Is metformin effective for reducing weight in obese or overweight adolescents? J Fam Pract. 2021 Mar;70(2):100-101. PMID: 33760905
citations.BibTeX: @article{33760905, title={Is metformin effective for reducing weight in obese or overweight adolescents?}, author={Anderson K and Kelsberg G and Safranek S}, journal={J Fam Pract}, volume={70}, number={2}, pages={100-101}}

results.title: Metformin reduces vascular endothelial dysfunction caused by an acute glucose load in patients with hypertension.
results.text_hl: MATERIALS AND METHODS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with untreated @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@PH@@@ were randomized to a no-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (@<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@PH@@@, n = 34) and a @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (@<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@PH@@@+ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@, n = 28) who received a single dose of 500 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ before testing.

citations.NLM: Zhang TX, Xu JX, Peng F, Chai DJ, Lin JX. Metformin reduces vascular endothelial dysfunction caused by an acute glucose load in patients with hypertension. Blood Press. 2013 Apr;22(2):106-13. PMID: 23140261
citations.BibTeX: @article{23140261, title={Metformin reduces vascular endothelial dysfunction caused by an acute glucose load in patients with hypertension.}, author={Zhang TX and Xu JX and Peng F and Chai DJ and Lin JX}, journal={Blood Press}, volume={22}, number={2}, pages={106-13}}

results.title: [Antihypertensive effect of metformin in essential hypertensive patients with hyperinsulinemia.].
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To investigate the possibility and utility of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone or in combination with @CHEMICAL_Fosinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017328 @@@fosinopril@@@ to reduce blood pressure in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Xing XY, Li YF, Fu ZD, Chen YY, Wang YF, Liu XL, Liu WY, Li GW. [Antihypertensive effect of metformin in essential hypertensive patients with hyperinsulinemia.]. Zhonghua Nei Ke Za Zhi. 2010 Jan;49(1):14-8. PMID: 20356474
citations.BibTeX: @article{20356474, title={[Antihypertensive effect of metformin in essential hypertensive patients with hyperinsulinemia.].}, author={Xing XY and Li YF and Fu ZD and Chen YY and Wang YF and Liu XL and Liu WY and Li GW}, journal={Zhonghua Nei Ke Za Zhi}, volume={49}, number={1}, pages={14-8}}

results.title: [A clinical intervention study among 463 essential hypertensive patients with metabolic syndrome].
results.journal: Zhonghua Xin Xue Guan Bing Za Zhi
results.text_hl: [A clinical intervention study among 463 @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Metabolic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D024821 @@@metabolic syndrome@@@].
